description:
This presentation was recorded at GOTO Copenhagen 2016
http://gotocph.com

Bridget Kromhout - Principal Technologist for Cloud Foundry at Pivotal

ABSTRACT
We endeavor to build consistency, availability, and fault tolerance into our distributed systems, but how do we build them into our teams? [...]

Download slides and read the full abstract here:
https://gotocon.com/cph-2016/presentations/show_talk.jsp?oid=7773

title: Distributed - of Systems and Teams
